* An entity that takes in the input from the console and parse it to valid command or throw exception
if (byIndex == -1) throw new IllegalArgumentException("/by command not found");
if (desc.isBlank()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("deadline desc cannot be empty");
if (timing.isBlank()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("deadline timing cannot be empty");

if (byIndex == -1) throw new IllegalArgumentException("/at command not found");

* Interface for the central processing unit of the commands that contain the logic and data layer
* function that takes a valid command from the model and the corresponding arguments (that are assumed to be correct already)
* @param command   one of the command from Command enum class
* @param arguments corresponding arguments for each command
void processCommand(Command command, Map<String, String> arguments);
* Command line processor interface that takes in the input from the console
* Parse the input from console into corresponding command and process it, current implementation using Command Processor
* list of commands available for dude chatting bot
*      BYE : to end the chat, no arguments requires, any extra arguments would be ignored, invoked using "bye"
*      LIST : list the entire tasks array
*     Adding a Task: divided into 3 smaller parts :
*       DEADLINE : add a new deadline, takes 3 arguments section: description, \by, deadline
*     EVENT : add a new deadline, takes 3 arguments section: description, \at, deadline
*        TODOS : add a new deadline, takes 1 argument : description
*      DONE : mark the task as done, 1 argument is required which is the number of task (the rest is ignored)
*      INVALID : any other commands other than bye, the whole sentence would be echoed back instead
* a task containing description and the deadline of the task
* String representation of deadline, marked with [D], desc and the deadline
* a task containing description and the time of the event
* @param time string representing the time of the event
* String representation of Event, marked with [E], desc and the timing
* abstract class of task that represents a thing to be done
* constructor of the abstract class, to be initialized with the subclass
* get the status of the task
* @return boolean representing whether the task is done
* @return [X] or [ ] indicating whether the task is done and the description
* String representation of todos, marked with [T] and the desc
* helper function to display the sentence for the CLI
* @param sentence the text to be printed
